```{r configEmojiFont, include=T, eval=T}
# see https://mran.microsoft.com/snapshot/2016-07-03/web/packages/emojifont/vignettes/emojifont.html
list.emojifonts()
load.emojifont('EmojiOne.ttf')

# test
set.seed(123)
x <- rnorm(10)
set.seed(321)
y <- rnorm(10)
plot(x, y, cex=0)
text(x, y, labels=emoji('cow'), cex=1.5, col='steelblue', family='EmojiOne')

#
d <- data.frame(x=x, y=y,
     label = sample(c(emoji('cow'), emoji('camel')), 10, replace=TRUE),
     type = sample(LETTERS[1:3], 10, replace=TRUE))

ggplot(d, aes(x, y, color=type, label=label)) + 
    geom_text(family="EmojiOne", size=6)
```
